entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:14 PM MST Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:14 PM MST Tuesday 2 May 2023
